featured.text: 24 the snow covering the peak, there will not be enough moisture and water to nourish the plants and animals below.
The loss of snows on the 5,892m peak, which have been there for about 11,700 years, could have disastrous effects on Tanzania.
Mangoes are a _____ fruit here in Taiwan; most of them reach their peak of sweetness in July.

definition.en_def: The highest point of a mountain or hill.
definition.example: We reached the peak of the mountain just before sunset.
